title: What hobby could you never give up? - Quora

response.answer_text: Chess. At one time, I was too busy playing chess to play chess. Let me explain.  I once had an account on Chess.com where I had 90 correspondence games going with a time limit of 24 hours per move. I would actually be down to a few hours of time on some of the games, would go to the local chess club, and play a few games there with a real person, thinking I would move in some of my online games while waiting for my opponent to move on the board. I would forget, or not have time, and lose those games online while at the same time playing a real life opponent.
